page.title: 14R.S.SOUTHAMPTON SPORTS
page.content: {Roadsea Southampton F.C.}were a small club playing in a local league borrowing pitches,when the manager's dreams became reality.They were offered a chance of the big time and {Southern League}football.The manager got a local shipping company to invest {Â£150,000}in a sports complex.They built a football ground with a capacity of{5,000}and a cricket pitch alongside.Most of the ground is for supporters;the rest for players,officials and club members.Between the cricket pitch and the football pitch there is a bar for the members which they are looking to extend by building further facilities.At the moment{Roadsea}have invested{Â£750,000}on this ambitious project.{Roadsea}are looking to widen their resources by becoming more successful as a club.
